word.literal: in the last half of the year
to tour; to make a circuit of
to put on a show; to grandstand
hit the nail on the head
he who takes the initiative gains the advantage

character.pinyin: xiān xiàshǒu wéiqiáng, hòu xiàshǒu zāoyāng
character.simplified: 先下手为强，后下手遭殃
character.traditional: 先下手為強，後下手遭殃
